organic.title: ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN – Patch Notes Version 1.01.2
organic.snippet: Fixed a bug where some non-direct attacks of specific weapons' skills would inflict the attribute attack power and status ailment of the weapon.

organic.title: BLEACH REBIRTH OF SOULS - Patch Version 1.10
organic.snippet: General Battle Adjustments/Changes. Adjusted the attack judgment of each Rebirth Action to improve situations where attacks would not hit.

organic.title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO: Combos and Features
organic.snippet: If you are close to your opponent, it will perform Step whilst if you are far away, it becomes Short Dash, which is useful for dodging various attacks such as Blast Attack. Dragon Dash. Press [R2/RT] + [✖/A], to rush at high speed towards the direction the stick is oriented ...

organic.title: Elden Ring – Patch Notes Version 1.14 - Bandai Namco
organic.snippet: Adjusted some attack moves. Decreased the damage of some attacks. Decreased stamina damage of some attacks. Decreased the attack range of some non-weapon-based attacks.

organic.title: ELDEN RING NIGHTREIGN – Starter Guide for PS5
organic.snippet: Press the [R1]/[R2] button to attack with your right-hand weapon, and [L1]/[L2] to use your left-hand weapon. You can equip a shield in your left hand and press [L1] to guard. You can also use your weapon's Skill by pressing the [L2] ...

organic.title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO: The Beginner's Guide
organic.snippet: Smash Attack: Can be used for close combos, hold [☐/X] to perform a Smash Attack. dbsz separator. Ki Blast: Throws a Ki blast. Hold [△/Y] to throw a Smash Ki Blast. dbsz separator. organic.title: BLEACH Rebirth of Souls - Starter Guide
organic.snippet: Use Quick Attack and Flash Attack combos, or knock your enemy back using an R2 follow-up attack, then hold down R2 when ”NOW OR NEVER” is displayed to execute a Kikon Move!
